rules_text:
Xami, Essence Beckoner enters with X charge counters on it.
When Xami enters or attacks, target artifact or enchantment you control becomes a Golem creature with base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of charge counters on Xami in addition to its other types..
Remove a charge counter from Xami: Add {C}. Use this mana only to cast artifact or enchantment spells.
